abstract: Justice Dept announces agreement with Hinds County, Miss, that requires local government to provide several effective and affordable options for reform of prison policies; county was found to have regularly kept inmates past their release dates, contributing to burgeoning prison population and rise in violence by guards and fellow inmates.
lead_paragraph: The settlement with Hinds County requires, for the first time, a local government to provide an array of options intended to reduce mass incarceration.

headline.main: Justice Department Reaches Deal With Mississippi County on Prison Reform
headline.print_headline: Justice Department Reaches a Landmark Prison Accord With a Mississippi County

snippet: The settlement with Hinds County requires, for the first time, a local government to provide an array of options intended to reduce mass incarceration.
